description: Lists all invocation steps associated with a session and optionally, an invocation within the session. For more information about sessions, see Store and retrieve conversation history and context with Amazon Bedrock sessions.

parameters.name: sessionIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the session associated with the invocation steps. You can specify either the session's sessionId or its Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: invocationStepSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of summaries for each invocation step associated with a session and if you specified it, an invocation within the session.

nested_items.name: invocationId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the invocation in UUID format.

nested_items.name: invocationStepId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier (in UUID format) for the invocation step.

nested_items.name: invocationStepTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the invocation step was created.

nested_items.name: sessionId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the session associated with the invocation step.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the total number of results is greater than the maxResults value provided in the request, use this token when making another request in the nextToken field to return the next batch of results.
